title: Torque Formula
text: Recall the formula for torque: T $$=$$ $$r F sin\left(\theta\right)$$.

title: Derive Equation from Zero Net Torque
text: Recall the formula for torque: T $$=$$ $$r F sin\left(\theta\right)$$. Here, $$T_{Net}$$ $$=$$ $$T_1$$ - $$T_2$$ $$=$$ $$0$$ Nm. Derive an equation and find the force that achieves the desired torque.

title: Solve for the Force
text: Solve for F: F * $$0.45$$ $$=$$ $$1250$$ * $$0.018$$ (round to the nearest Newton).
